com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache

Interface CacheEvictor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cache.Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LeastRecentlyUsedCacheEvictor, NoOpCacheEvictor

    public interface CacheEvictor
extends Cache.Listener
    Evicts data from a Cache. Implementations should call Cache.removeSpan(CacheSpan) to evict cache entries based on their eviction policies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStartFile(Cache cache, java.lang.String key, long position, long length)
      Invoked when a writer starts writing to the cache.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache.Cache.Listener

        onSpanAdded, onSpanRemoved, onSpanTouched

    • Method Detail

      • onStartFile

        void onStartFile(Cache cache,
               java.lang.String key,
               long position,
               long length)
        Invoked when a writer starts writing to the cache.
        Parameters:
        cache - The source of the event.
        key - The key being written.
        position - The starting position of the data being written.
        length - The maximum length of the data being written.
